# SCMP (Configuration Management Plan) — Checklist

> Cite: ISO 10007 — CM_Planning; Configuration_Identification; Change_Control; Status_Accounting; Audit
> Also: IEEE 828 — CM_Plan_Content; Roles_Responsibilities

-   [ ] CM scope, objectives, roles (10007.CM_Planning; 828.Roles_Responsibilities)
-   [ ] Configuration identification: item list, naming, SemVer tags, baselines (10007.Configuration_Identification)
-   [ ] Change control: categories (standard/urgent/concession), approvals, **Required status checks** (coverage, docs, RTM, ADR) (10007.Change_Control)
-   [ ] Status accounting: what/where recorded (Release page; coverage XML/HTML; Release-Record) (10007.Status_Accounting)
-   [ ] Audits (FCA/PCA): entry/exit criteria, artifacts (10007.Audit)
-   [ ] Tools & repositories; permissions
-   [ ] Release packaging: attach binaries + coverage HTML/XML; notes/CHANGELOG
-   [ ] Records retention & accessibility
